item.title: 赛诺菲将向 CD&R 出售 Opella 51%的股份，向 BPI 出售 1%的股份
item.description: 法国财政部长安托万-阿尔芒（Antoine Armand）周日表示，法国将通过公共投资银行（BPI）入股赛诺菲旗下的奥佩拉公司（Opella），这证实了《费加罗报》的消息，即美国私募股权公司克莱顿-杜比利尔-赖斯公司（CD&R）将入股该公司51%的股份，该公司生产法国销量最大的止痛药之一多利普兰。【原文：France will take a stake in Sanofi 's Opella through the Public Investment Bank (BPI), finance minister Antoine Armand said on Sunday, confirming an information from Le Figaro newspaper that U.S. private equity firm Clayton Dubilier & Rice (CD&R) is to take a 51% stake in the company that makes of one of France's most-sold painkillers, Doliprane.】

item.title: 波音向泰雷兹出售小型防务监控设备
item.description: 波音公司本月完成了出售一家小型国防子公司的交易，该公司为美国军方生产监控设备。【原文：Boeing closed a deal this month to sell a small defense subsidiary that makes surveillance equipment for the U.S. military, the company said on Sunday, as the planemaker looks to shore up its struggling finances.】

item.title: 印度零售集团寻求对快速商务公司 Swiggy、Blinkit 和 Zepto 进行反垄断调查
item.description: 周日的一封信显示，印度最大的零售分销商集团要求反垄断机构调查三家快速商务公司--Zomato 旗下的 Blinkit、Swiggy 和 Zepto--涉嫌掠夺性定价。【原文：India's biggest group of retail distributors has asked the antitrust authority to investigate three quick commerce companies - Zomato's Blinkit, Swiggy and Zepto - for alleged predatory pricing, a letter showed on Sunday.】

item.title: 意大利报纸称德国正在酝酿保护银行免受外资收购的法律
item.description: 据意大利《共和报》周日报道，在意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit）寻求与德国商业银行（Commerzbank）合并之际，德国正在考虑出台一项法律，以保护国内银行免受跨国收购。【原文：Germany is considering introducing a law to protect domestic banks from cross-border takeovers, Italian newspaper La Repubblica reported on Sunday, as Italy's UniCredit seeks a merger with Germany's Commerzbank .】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，波音公司正在探索出售资产以改善财务状况
item.description: 罢工的机械工人周三就新的合同提案进行投票。【原文：Striking machinists vote Wednesday on a new contract proposal.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星公司利用 SpaceX 火箭发射合并后的首批卫星
item.description: SpaceX 猎鹰 9 号火箭携带欧洲通信卫星组织的卫星从加利福尼亚范登堡空军基地起飞。【原文：A SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket took off with Eutelsat satellites from California's Vandenberg Space Force Base.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，GQG Partners 因 Sabadell 恶意收购而出售 BBVA 股份
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周日报道，西班牙 BBVA 银行的最大股东之一 GQG Partners 已出售其股份，原因是该银行决定对国内竞争对手萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell）进行恶意收购。【原文：GQG Partners, one of Spanish bank BBVA's biggest shareholders, has sold its stake over the bank's decision to pursue a hostile bid for domestic rival Banco Sabadell , the Financial Times reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，埃利奥特与西南航空公司将开始和解讨论
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周六援引知情人士的话报道，埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）和美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines）已开始讨论可能的和解方案，以避免为争夺航空公司董事会控制权而进行代理权争夺。【原文：Elliott Investment Management and Southwest Airlines have begun discussing a potential settlement that would avoid a proxy fight for control of the airline's board, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 飞往纽约的波音 767 飞机在塞内加尔起飞时紧急停车
item.description: 西非国家塞内加尔交通部称，周六，达美航空公司一架飞往纽约的波音 767 飞机在塞内加尔布莱斯-迪亚涅国际机场因技术故障紧急停车。【原文：A Delta Airlines Boeing 767 aircraft bound for New York made an emergency stop due to a technical incident at the Blaise Diagne International Airport in Senegal on Saturday, the West African nation's transport ministry said.】

item.title: 巴西证券监管机构指控美航八名前高管内幕交易
item.description: 巴西证券监管机构 CVM 指控零售商 Americanas 的八名前高管在 2023 年披露备受瞩目的会计丑闻之前进行涉及该公司证券的内幕交易。【原文：Brazil's securities regulator CVM accused eight former executives of retailer Americanas of insider trading involving the company's securities ahead of the disclosure of a high-profile accounting scandal in 2023.】

item.title: 波音公司提出四年内加薪 35% 以结束机械师罢工
item.description: 他们的停工导致该公司最畅销的 737 MAX 以及 767 和 777 宽体飞机的生产停顿。【原文：Their work stoppage has halted production of the plane maker's best-selling 737 MAX and its 767 and 777 widebodies.】

item.title: 印度部长表示，印度寻求与美国达成关键矿产协议，并希望达成贸易协定
item.description: 印度贸易部长周六表示，印度已寻求与美国达成一项重要的矿产合作协议，他希望两国能就更广泛的贸易协定进行谈判。【原文：India's trade minister on Saturday said the country has sought a critical mineral partnership agreement with the United States as he hopes for talks on a broader trade pact between the two nations.】

item.title: 中国无人机制造商大疆因中国军方列名起诉五角大楼
item.description: 中国的大疆创新公司周五起诉美国国防部，称美国国防部将该无人机制造商列入涉嫌与中国军方合作的公司名单，称这一指认是错误的，给该公司造成了巨大的经济损失。【原文：China-based DJI sued the U.S. Defense Department on Friday for adding the drone maker to a list of companies allegedly working with Beijing's military, saying the designation is wrong and has caused the company significant financial harms.】

item.title: AT&T 批准与 CWA 工会的协议
item.description: 电信运营商 AT&T 周五批准了与美国东南部和西部通信工人协会（Communications Workers of America）达成的协议，该协议涵盖 11 个州约 23,000 名员工。【原文：Telecom operator AT&T on Friday ratified agreements with the Communications Workers of America in the Southeast and West, which covers about 23,000 employees across eleven states.】

item.title: 精神航空债务再融资截止日期延至 12 月
item.description: 精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines）周五表示，该公司已与信用卡处理商达成协议，将债务再融资期限延长两个月至 12 月 23 日。【原文：Spirit Airlines said on Friday it has reached an agreement with its credit card processor to extend a debt refinancing deadline by two months until Dec. 23.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会为现货比特币 ETF 在纽约证券交易所的期权上市开绿灯
item.description: 一份监管文件显示，美国证券监管机构已 "加速批准 "11家交易所交易基金在纽约证券交易所上市交易与比特币现货价格挂钩的期权。【原文：The U.S. securities regulator has granted "accelerated approval" to 11 exchange-traded funds to list and trade options tied to spot bitcoin prices on the New York Stock Exchange, according to a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 巴西航空工业公司第三季度交付 57 架非国防飞机
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周五在提交的一份证券文件中称，该公司第三季度交付了 57 架非国防飞机。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer delivered 57 non-defense aircraft in the third quarter, it said on Friday in a securities filing.】

item.title: 消息人士称，OpenAI 前技术主管米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）将为新的人工智能初创公司融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的消息人士透露，OpenAI 前首席技术官米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）正在为她新成立的人工智能初创公司向风险投资者筹集资金。【原文：Mira Murati, former chief technology officer at OpenAI, is raising funds from venture capitalists for her new AI startup, according to sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Cigna 恢复与 Humana 的合并讨论
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，美国医疗保险公司 Cigna Group 在去年底放弃与规模较小的竞争对手 Humana 合并的努力后，又重新启动了合并计划。【原文：U.S. health insurer Cigna Group has revived efforts to merge with smaller rival Humana after abandoning the pursuit late last year, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金以五个月来最快速度抢购科技股
item.description: 据高盛（Goldman Sachs）周五称，在第三季度财报季开始之际，全球对冲基金本周以五个月来最快的速度买入了半导体和硬件等美国信息技术类股票。【原文：Global hedge funds this week bought U.S. information technology stocks, such as semiconductors and hardware, at the fastest in five months amid the start of the third-quarter earnings season, according to Goldman Sachs on Friday.】

item.title: 中国建造的秘鲁超大型港口将于 11 月开始每周运送两艘集装箱船
item.description: 秘鲁昌凯港运营商中国中远海运的一位高管周五表示，在该港口于 11 月中旬落成后，秘鲁昌凯港将于下月下旬开始每周运送两艘集装箱船。【原文：Peru's massive Chancay port will begin shipping two container ships a week late next month following the port's inauguration in mid-November, an executive for the port's operator, China's Cosco Shipping, said on Friday.】

item.title: 罢工工会与波音公司积极 "间接讨论"，试图达成协议
item.description: 代表波音公司罢工机工的一个工会周五表示，该工会正积极与这家飞机制造商进行间接讨论，美国代理劳工部长苏珊娜（Julie Su）正在促成这一讨论。【原文：A union representing striking machinists at Boeing said Friday it is actively engaged in indirect discussions with the planemaker that are being facilitated by Acting U.S. Labor Secretary Julie Su.】

item.title: 美国陪审团称，西部数据因侵犯数据安全专利欠款 3.157 亿美元
item.description: 加利福尼亚州联邦法院的一个陪审团周五表示，数据存储供应商西部数据公司必须支付 3.157 亿美元的赔偿金，因为该公司侵犯了数据安全技术专利所有人的权利。【原文：Data storage provider Western Digital must pay $315.7 million in damages for violating a patent owner's rights in data security technology, a jury in California federal court said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国 2024 财年预算赤字高达 1.8 万亿美元，为历史第三大赤字
item.description: 美国财政部周五表示，2024 财年美国预算赤字将增至 1.833 万亿美元，创下 COVID-19 时代以外的最高纪录，原因是联邦债务利息首次突破 1 万亿美元，以及社会保障退休计划、医疗保健和军事支出的增长。【原文：The U.S. budget deficit grew to $1.833 trillion for fiscal 2024, the highest outside of the COVID-19 era, as interest on the federal debt topped $1 trillion for the first time and spending grew for the Social Security retirement program, health care and the military, the Treasury Department said on Friday.】

item.title: 星巴克新任首席执行官任命同为 Chipotle 校友的人担任高级营销职务
item.description: 星巴克周二宣布聘请食品营销资深人士特蕾西-利伯曼（Tressie Lieberman）担任其高级营销职务，这是新任首席执行官布莱恩-尼科尔（Brian Niccol）一系列高管调整中的最新人事变动。【原文：Starbucks on Tuesday announced it hired food marketing veteran Tressie Lieberman to take its top marketing job, the latest in a spate of executive reshuffling by new CEO Brian Niccol.】

item.title: 美国法官批准谷歌要求暂时搁置 Play 商店全面改革的请求
item.description: 谷歌周五表示，加利福尼亚州的一名联邦法官批准了谷歌的请求，暂停执行命令，该命令要求 Alphabet 旗下公司在 11 月 1 日前对其安卓应用商店 Play 进行彻底改革，以便让消费者在下载软件时有更多选择。【原文：Google said on Friday that a federal judge in California granted its request to pause his order directing the Alphabet unit to overhaul its Android app store Play by Nov. 1 to give consumers more choice over how they download software.】

item.title: 美联储主席博斯蒂克表示不急于将利率降至中性水平
item.description: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行行长拉斐尔-博斯蒂克（Raphael Bostic）周五表示，他将在降息问题上保持耐心，以确保通胀率不会超过美国央行2%的目标。 "博斯蒂克在密西西比州杰克逊市举行的密西西比州经济教育委员会美国企业论坛上说："我并不急于求成。"我们必须让通胀率回到 2% 的目标；我不希望我们的通胀率超过 2%。【原文：Atlanta Federal Reserve Bank President Raphael Bostic said Friday he will be patient on cutting rates to make sure inflation does not stall out above the U.S. central bank's 2% target. "I'm not in a rush to get anywhere," Bostic told the Mississippi Council on Economic Education Forum on American Enterprise in Jackson, Mississippi. "We must get inflation back to our 2% target; I don't want us to g】

item.title: Meta 发布可检查其他人工智能模型工作的人工智能模型
item.description: Facebook 的所有者 Meta 公司周五表示，它将从其研究部门发布一批新的人工智能模型，其中包括一个 "自学评估器"，它可能为减少人工智能开发过程中的人工参与提供了一条途径。【原文：Facebook owner Meta said on Friday it was releasing a batch of new AI models from its research division, including a "Self-Taught Evaluator" that may offer a path toward less human involvement in the AI development process.】

item.title: 法官裁定，Meta 必须面对马萨诸塞州社交媒体成瘾诉讼
item.description: 马萨诸塞州一名法官驳回了 Meta Platforms 公司要求驳回该州指控该社交媒体公司故意在其 Instagram 平台上设置让年轻用户上瘾的功能，并就其产品对青少年心理健康造成的危害欺骗公众的诉讼。【原文：A Massachusetts judge has rejected Meta Platforms' bid to dismiss a lawsuit by the state alleging the social media company purposely deployed features on its Instagram platform to addict young users and deceived the public about the dangers its product posed to teenagers' mental health.】

item.title: 美国议员要求司法部和国防部调查麦肯锡并审查合同
item.description: 一群美国议员要求司法部和国防部（Department of Defense）调查麦肯锡未披露其与中国政府合作的情况，称这家咨询巨头可能面临利益冲突，需要进行审查。【原文：A group of U.S. lawmakers have asked the Department of Justice and the Department of Defense (DoD) to investigate McKinsey's failure to disclose its work with China's government, saying that the consulting giant might face conflicts of interest that require reviewing.】
